creator: New keyboard Theme for Android 2020
descriptionHtml:
🔆Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme🔆

Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme. Want your phone awesome to be? Let Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme help you! Take the Galaxy Hearts keyboard and have a splendid experience now!

💛Download and install Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme for FREE right now!
💖Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme will make your device look amazing!
💚New Free Galaxy Hearts keyboard theme will give a really new look & feel to your keyboard & text input, and make your Android device keyboard cool, cute and unique.
💙Thousands of FREE and beautiful themes are waiting for you.
💜Check this FREE personalised design for your Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme!
Go and type interestingly!

⚙️How to Use Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme:
1. Download Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme from Play Store and open it;
2. Click the APPLY button or the preview picture of Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme;
3. Bravo! You have installed and applied Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme;
4. Press the Finish button and then enjoy the Galaxy Hearts Keyboard app.

🎉Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Key Features:
* Voice input;
* Gesture typing;
* Advanced auto-correction & auto-suggestion engine;
* Stylish Keyboard Sticker and Emoji Arts；
* Integrated emoji & word predictions；
* Clipboard for multiple fast copy and paste；
* A lot more new features improving your typing wish you to experience.

❤️Want more themes?
Our Keyboard provides free and perfect stylish & fashion keyboard HD wallpapers to decorate your phone background. (You can get anime, black, 3D, skull, dragon, gold, cartoon, panda, green, cat, lion, clown, sport, pink, red, purple, love, girl, soccer, wolf, graffiti life, car, neon, white, blue, music, etc. and find all your favourite topics in the Store.)
We usually update NEW themes three times a week. Please keep your attention on our Store frequently.

🅰️ Multi Language Typing？
Our Keyboard, which has been loved deeply by over 20 million users, supports over 150 languages and still counting. (Including but not limited to English, العربية, Hrvatski, Čeština, Nederlands, Français, Deutsch, Ελληνικά, עִברִית, , Bahasa Indonesia, Italiano, Malay, Pilipino, Polskie, Português, Română, Русский, Español, ไทย, Türk, Euskara, বাঙালি, ಕನ್ನಡ, ភាសាខ្មែរ, ພາສາລາວ, മലയാളം, , Монгол, , தமிழ், తెలుగు, Zulu.）

🎨What else can you do?
Our Keyboard allows you to customise the keyboard theme by choosing your own photos, HD wallpapers, emojis HD wallpapers, applock pictures or launcher pictures. You can also change the theme colours (including background and buttons), customise the font style, font size and color! Be the designer yourself, hold your own style.

📲Supported devices？
Our Keyboard is compatible with almost all android phones. (Including but not limited to Samsung Galaxy Note 8, Note 6, Note 5, Samsung Galaxy J7, Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8 Edge, S9, S9 +；Sony Xperia Z5, Sony Xperia Z4; Huawei P10 and P10 Plus, Huawei Mate 10, Huawei P9, Huawei Honor 8; HTC 10, HTC One A9; OPPO Find 9; OPPO F3 Plus; Xiaomi Mix, Xiaomi 6; Nokia 8; VIVO V5 Plus，Moto, etc.)

🛡 Don't worry about privacy and security:
We will never collect your personal info or collect the photos you set as HD wallpapers. We only use the words typed by you to make the predictions more accurate.

Add Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme in your phone! Let Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme show its unique charm, your phone can be really different with Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme. Feeling attractive now? Install the Galaxy Hearts Keyboard Theme and apply it now!
descriptionShort: Install and stylish keyboard with Galaxy Hearts Theme now!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Optimized application performance and loading speed.
2. Solved experience bug(some users could not download keyboard engine).
3. Optimized application interface interaction, better visual appearance, easier operation and faster typing.
